column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////But when we got our bill
column2: we were charged for two dessert tapas
column3: with only one free.  We called our waitress over
column4: and she gave us nothing but excuses - "oh yeah
column5: we've been having trouble with those yelp check ins
column6: it's only for one dessert."  I pointed out to her that the wording of the yelp coupon said that it was for 1 tapa for EACH guest
column9: that's not what the deal is."
